import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import Cookie from"js-cookie";import{productListReducers}from"./reducers/productReducers";const reducer=combineReducers({productList:productListReducers});//composeEnhancer 用于连接 Redux DevTools（如果存在）。如果没有 DevTools，它将使用默认的 compose。
const composeEnhancer=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;const store=createStore(reducer,composeEnhancer(applyMiddleware(thunk)));export default store;
